data.Name: United Wind
data.Tagline: United Wind, a U.S.-based company that offers small-scale wind turbine leases along with installation services.
data.About:
United Wind Inc. is the national leader in wind energy leasing. We offer an affordable turn-key wind energy solution. United Wind’s WindLease™ lets you make the switch to cost-effective wind energy without traditionally high upfront costs. We believe customers should be in the driver’s seat when it comes to paying for electricity – Be your own power company and stay protected from rising electric rates with United Wind.

United Wind Inc. manages everything from lease approval, permitting to installation and maintenance. We come equipped with proprietary software and satellite imagery which allows us to remotely identify a properties suitability within seconds. 

To get started and learn more, contact one of our wind specialists at 888.313.3353.
